cond.title: enchant.js cannot be loaded.
cond.content: To load enchant.js, it must be added within the <head> tag of index.html. [code]<script src='http://coderun.9leap.net/static/enchant.js-latest/enchant.js'></script>[/code] For tips, please start from 'Starting with enchant.js' from the dashboard and fork a starting lesson.

cond.title: Syntax Error
cond.content: There is no problem loading enchant.js, but there is a syntax error somewhere in main.js. This could be caused by a missing enchant(); statement.

cond.title: Aren't you forgetting the addChild statement?
cond.content: When you create a new object with 'new Sprite();' or 'new Label()', you must add it to the root scene of the main game object with [code]game.rootScene.addChild(sprite);[/code]
